Title: Portable Puzzle Collection
Description: Port of Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection to a C++ Windows Store app. Built with XAML and Direct2D. Contains 38 puzzles with custom difficulty options.
HomeWiki:
Portable Puzzle Collection for Windows Store

Port of Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection to C++ Windows Store and Windows Phone apps. The interface is built in XAML, and the graphics are drawn with Direct2D.


Available for Windows 8.1 and Windows 10 phones, tablets and desktops.

List of puzzles

Black Box, Bridges, Cube, Dominosa, Fifteen, Filling, Flip, Flood, Galaxies, Guess, Inertia, Keen, Light Up, Loopy, Magnets, Map, Mines (Minesweeper), Net, Netslide, Palisade, Pattern, Pearl, Pegs (Solitaire), Range, Rectangles, Same Game, Signpost, Singles, Sixteen, Slant, Solo (Sudoku), Tents, Towers, Train Tracks, Twiddle, Undead, Unequal, Unruly, Untangle

Features

  • Virtual keyboard for touch control
  • Colorblind setting for Flood, Guess, Map and Same Game puzzles
  • Save games to harddisk, OneDrive or other service
  • Send saved games using the Share charm
  • Cancel button during puzzle generation
